The db.censusnz package prepares rda files for different geography and year combinations 
of census data from the options listed below, to be used by the censusnz package.

Geography parameter options:

*  Statistical Area 1
*  Statistical Area 2
*  Ward
*  District Health Board
*  Local Board Area (Auckland region only)
*  Territorial Authority
*  Regional Council

Year parameter options:

*  2006
*  2013
*  2018

These files can be generated by running the following files in db-censusnz/data-raw:

*  1 download_source_data
*  2 process_census_data
*  3 available_variables
